definitions.definition: To clarify something by giving , or serving as, an example or a comparison .
examples: We illustrate our definitions by including quotations or simple examples.

definitions.definition: To provide a book or other publication with pictures , diagrams or other explanatory or decorative features .
examples: The economics textbook was illustrated with many graphs.

definitions.definition: To give renown or honour to; to make illustrious .

main_definition: ( figurative ) To clarify something by giving , or serving as, an example or a comparison .
secondary_definitions: To provide a book or other publication with pictures , diagrams or other explanatory or decorative features .
( obsolete ) To give renown or honour to; to make illustrious .
